Chapter Previous

class gstForceField : public gstBoundedHapticObj

The GHOST Force Field Class. The class is implemented to allow the developer to prescribe forces to the PHANToM when the user is within the associated bounding volume. The implementation is based on the developer subclassing this class and overloading the calculateForceFieldForce. The forces are integrated with forces generated by the shape objects in the scene.

From header file: gstForceField.h

Functions
CloneForceField
attenuatedForce Internal method used to attenuate the force as the user moves away from the force field boundary.

getNextForceFieldInScene Returns "next" force field in force field scene list.
attenuateToObjectForces This method is used to attenuate the forces from the force fields to the object forces in the scene.
getClassTypeId Static: get type id of this class.
getForceFieldsInScene Internal method used to get the number of force fields currently in the scene.
